applications.name: To-Do List (Basic)
applications.subHeading: A basic list builder written using TypeScript and JQuery
applications.description: Using Babel for compilation and Require to manage dependencies.

applications.name: To-Do List (React)
applications.subHeading: A basic list builder using React
applications.description: Using React, with Babel and Webpack.

applications.name: To-Do List (React Redux)
applications.subHeading: A basic list builder using React and Redux
applications.description: Using Redux with React to manage application state, implementing Undo and Redo functionality.

applications.name: To-Do List (Vue)
applications.subHeading: A basic list builder using Vue
applications.description: Experimenting with Vue, Babel and Webpack.

applications.name: Tic-Tac-Toe (React)
applications.subHeading: A Tic-Tac-Toe game built using React
applications.description: Experimenting with more complex aspects of React, Babel and Webpack.

applications.name: TypeScript Find and Replace
applications.subHeading: A simple multiple Find and Replace method written with TypeScript
applications.description: TypeScript, Sass and Pug. Find all occurrences and replacing.

applications.name: Azure Functions .NET, Unique Data Entry
applications.subHeading: Unique data entry implementing IEqualityComparer to manage illegal duplicate data entries, with a React UI
applications.description: Using Azure Functions serverless compute and .NET, with a React user interface.

applications.name: Azure Functions .NET, Data Structures
applications.subHeading: First in, first out (FIFO) and last in, first out (LIFO) data structures implementing Queue and Stack in .NET, with a React UI
applications.description: Using Azure Functions serverless compute and .NET, with a React user interface.

applications.name: AWS .NET, Complex Entity Sorting Algorithm
applications.subHeading: A sorting mechanism, implementing IComparable and IComparer to sort complex types, with a React UI
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.name: AWS .NET, Natural Sorting Algorithm
applications.subHeading: A natural string sorting algorithm, implementing IComparer in .NET, passing in a custom comparer, with a React UI
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.name: AWS .NET, Shopping Basket List Builder
applications.subHeading: A basic shopping basket application, with data processing handled by a Serverless .NET RESTful API, with a React UI
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.name: AWS .NET, Asynchronous Coffee Maker
applications.subHeading: Demonstraiting knowledge of asynchrony, multithreading and the State Machine in .NET, with a React UI
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.name: Three JS Scene (Basic)

applications.description: Exploring WebXR applications using AFrame and React. Compiled with Babel and Webpack.

applications.name: Scrabble Game, Can you beat the Un-Scrabbler?

applications.name: TypeScript Dictionary Word Finder
